data.what_is: With LeadScoreApp, you can track everything your leads do on the site. Use your leads' digital footprint to automate and target marketing to focus sales efforts on hot leads.
data.product_description: With LeadScoreApp, you can track everything your leads do on the site. Use your leads' digital footprint to automate and target marketing to focus sales efforts on hot leads.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about LeadScoreApp?
LeadScoreApp is a leading sales and marketing application that helps to gather the right set of target customers. It is very helpful. It helps to track processes and keeps scores of all the data collected.

What do you dislike about LeadScoreApp?
Though the application provides a lot of helpful and useful information to improve sales and marketing; it is not very user-friendly to use. I feel the data is a bit scattered and sometimes the analysis isn't fully accurate.

Recommendations to others considering LeadScoreApp:
Try improving the application and make it a bit user-friendly. The data can be more precise if it is sorted properly.

What problems is LeadScoreApp solving and how is that benefiting you?
Certain sales and marketing business problems are being solved with the help of LeadScoreApp. It helps in attracting the target customers and also provides helpful insights.
